title.rendered: Tastebudz Back to the Future Feminized cannabis seeds

content.rendered:
🕰️ Back to the Future Strain – Feminized Photoperiod Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Time-Warped THC | Legendary Genetics | 33% Potency

Take a leap forward with the Back to the Future strain — a next-gen hybrid by Tastebudz Syndicate, crafted from the elite fusion of Gorilla Glue #4 (Original Glue) and Alien Tahoe OG. This feminized cannabis seed was engineered by tracing the best traits from Future #1’s legendary lineage. Expect monstrous resin, euphoric body highs, and flavour-packed buds.

With up to 33% THC, this high THC strain is no casual encounter. Whether you’re a connoisseur, extractor, or high-tolerance enthusiast, Back to the Future offers next-level potency and resin production in one reliable photoperiod package.

📊 Back to the Future Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Gorilla Glue #4 x Alien Tahoe OG
Strain Type 80% Indica / 20% Sativa (Photoperiod Feminized Seeds)
THC Content Up to 33%
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks
Indoor Yield Up to 800g/m²
Outdoor Yield 700–800g/plant
Flavours Earthy pine, sour lemon, diesel
Aromas Pungent pine, citrus, kush
Effects Euphoric, relaxing, couch-locking

🌲 Flavour & Aroma of the Back to the Future Strain

The Back to the Future strain reveals rich layers of pungent pine and zesty lemon on the inhale, with diesel undertones on the exhale. Bursting with terpenes like alpha-pinene, limonene, humulene, and linalool, it’s the perfect choice for flavour-focused collectors and fans of Gorilla Glue crosses.

🧠 Effects: Euphoric Calm & Heavy Body Stone

This indica dominant cannabis strain delivers a powerful cerebral lift before locking into full-body relaxation. The experience is ideal for stress relief, insomnia, and muscle tension — a strong couch-lock strain that truly earns its name.

Expect a long-lasting, sedative stone paired with uplifted mood and a mellow mental buzz.

🌿 Growing the Back to the Future Strain

These feminized photoperiod cannabis seeds thrive in both indoor and outdoor environments. Great for SCROG setups, this strain stretches fast with wide lateral branches and chunky, trichome-heavy buds.

With a flowering cycle of 8–9 weeks, it produces huge yields and sticky buds so resinous, you’ll need multiple pairs of scissors to trim. Outdoor plants flourish in warm climates, delivering maximum returns.

💡 Also featured in our Feminized Mix 4 Pack →

🔥 What Makes Back to the Future Strain a Top Pick?

Whether you’re chasing a high THC strain, a heavy yielding cannabis strain, or something packed with resin for extraction, the Back to the Future strain delivers. Its indica-dominant cannabis seed profile and legendary Gorilla Glue cross genetics make it one of the most well-rounded and reliable strains in the Tastebudz catalogue.

Collectors seeking top-tier performance, rich terpenes, and proven genetics consistently choose the Back to the Future strain as a must-have.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About the Back to the Future Strain

1. What is the Back to the Future strain?
It’s a feminized photoperiod strain created from Gorilla Glue #4 and Alien Tahoe OG — known for 33% THC, intense resin, and couch-locking effects.

2. Is Back to the Future indica or sativa?
It’s an 80% indica / 20% sativa hybrid, perfect for deep relaxation with a euphoric mental lift.

3. Is it suitable for making extracts?
Yes. Its dense trichomes and terpene-rich profile make it a go-to for rosin, hash, and live resin collectors.

4. How long does it take to flower?
Expect a flowering period of 8 to 9 weeks, with large, sticky buds and top-tier yields.

5. Is there an autoflowering version of this strain?
Yes! Check out the Back to the Future Auto strain → for faster cycles and compact growth.

✅ Why Choose the Back to the Future Strain?

If you’re searching for photoperiod cannabis seeds that deliver top-tier resin, flavour, and knockout effects — this is it. With 33% THC, massive yields, and legendary lineage, the Back to the Future strain is a collector’s dream.

⚖️ Legal Disclaimer (UK Customers)

These cannabis seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license. Please check your local laws before purchasing.
